Member Function Documentation

tColor Navico::tRadarColourLookUpTable::GetColour ( uint32_t  index)
inline

Gets a colour at a partcular index.

Note: no check is done on boundaries of the vector, to speed things up!!! Normally we have 16 colours.

Returns
the color value in alpha-red-green-blue value
